casebody.data:
Maurice Hansen et al. v. City of New Haven et al. (13380)

Dupont, C. J., and Schaller and Spear, Js.

Argued April 20 decision released May 23, 1995 Frank P. Cannatelli, for the appellants-appellees (plaintiffs). Steven L. Sanalot, assistant corporation counsel, with whom, on the brief was Aileen M. Bell, former deputy corporation counsel, for the appellees-appellants (defendants). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
